Texts.Chs: 一个奇怪的花园，好吧。但也很漂亮。
Texts.Eng: A strange garden, alright. But a mighty pretty one too.

Texts.Chs: 即将到来的鲛人趋势-培育海洋植物的花坛！
Texts.Eng: An upcoming Hylotl trend - cultivating flowerbeds of sea flora!

Texts.Chs: 种植者通过用一种特殊的溶液浇灌这些植物来使其保持水分。
Texts.Eng: By watering these plants with a special solution, the planters can sustain them out of water.

Texts.Chs: 不要在海上种植...需要留在海里吗？
Texts.Eng: Don't ssea plants... need to stay in the ssea?

Texts.Chs: 我以前从未见过海上花园。非常可爱。
Texts.Eng: I've never seen a sea garden before. It's positively lovely.

Texts.Chs: 那发光的房间真的增加了气氛！
Texts.Eng: That glowing oshroom really adds to the atmosphere!

Texts.Chs: 海洋植物群的颜色在水面外更加鲜艳。
Texts.Eng: The colors of the sea flora are much more vibrant out of the water.

Texts.Chs: 多么新奇的想法！但是它们是如何在水外生存的呢？
Texts.Eng: What a novel idea! But how do these survive outside the water?
